sourcesContent: Welcome, {{authService.getName()}}, to your personal recipe book! I'm delighted to have you here. This is the place where your culinary ideas come to life and where you can create, save and share your favourite recipes. Whether you're a culinary expert or a kitchen novice, you'll find inspiration and ease in exploring the world of good food. Get ready for a unique culinary adventure designed just for you. Enjoy your virtual kitchen!
